Apply.Name: Apply
Apply.SQLExpression: "N$10018" as (SELECT /*+ inline */ "CUST_ID" , PREDICTION("ODMUSER"."CLAS_GLM_1_28" USING *) "CLAS_GLM_1_11_PRED" , PREDICTION_PROBABILITY("ODMUSER"."CLAS_GLM_1_28", 1 USING *) "CLAS_GLM_1_11_PROB_1" , PREDICTION_BOUNDS("ODMUSER"."CLAS_GLM_1_28", 0.95, 1 USING *).LOWER "CLAS_GLM_1_11_PBLW_1" , PREDICTION_BOUNDS("ODMUSER"."CLAS_GLM_1_28", 0.95, 1 USING *).UPPER "CLAS_GLM_1_11_PBUP_1" FROM {INPUT_SOURCE} )

ModelDetails.Name: Model Details
ModelDetails.SQLExpression: "N$10023" as (select "MODEL_SCHEMA", "MODEL_NAME", "CLASS", "ATTRIBUTE_NAME", "ATTRIBUTE_SUBNAME", "ATTRIBUTE_VALUE", "COEFFICIENT", "STD_ERROR", "TEST_STATISTIC", "P_VALUE", "VIF", "STD_COEFFICIENT", "LOWER_COEFF_LIMIT", "UPPER_COEFF_LIMIT", "EXP_COEFFICIENT", "EXP_LOWER_COEFF_LIMIT", "EXP_UPPER_COEFF_LIMIT" from (SELECT CAST('ODMUSER' AS VARCHAR2(30)) as "MODEL_SCHEMA", CAST('CLAS_GLM_1_28' AS VARCHAR2(30)) as "MODEL_NAME", t.class as "CLASS", t.attribute_name as "ATTRIBUTE_NAME", t.attribute_subname as "ATTRIBUTE_SUBNAME", t.attribute_value as "ATTRIBUTE_VALUE", t.coefficient as "COEFFICIENT", t.std_error as "STD_ERROR", t.test_statistic as "TEST_STATISTIC", t.p_value as "P_VALUE", t.vif as "VIF", t.std_coefficient as "STD_COEFFICIENT", t.lower_coeff_limit as "LOWER_COEFF_LIMIT", t.upper_coeff_limit as "UPPER_COEFF_LIMIT", t.exp_coefficient as "EXP_COEFFICIENT", t.exp_lower_coeff_limit as "EXP_LOWER_COEFF_LIMIT", t.exp_upper_coeff_limit as "EXP_UPPER_COEFF_LIMIT" FROM TABLE(dbms_data_mining.GET_MODEL_DETAILS_GLM('"ODMUSER"."CLAS_GLM_1_28"')) t) )

ModelDetails.Name: Model Details 1
ModelDetails.SQLExpression: "N$10029" as (select "MODEL_SCHEMA", "MODEL_NAME", "ID", "CLUSTER_ID", "RECORD_COUNT", "DISPERSION", "PARENT", "TREE_LEVEL", "IS_LEAF" from (SELECT DISTINCT CAST('ODMUSER' AS VARCHAR2(30)) as "MODEL_SCHEMA", CAST('CLUS_KM_1_28' AS VARCHAR2(30)) as "MODEL_NAME", t.id as "ID", t.cluster_id as "CLUSTER_ID", t.record_count as "RECORD_COUNT", t.dispersion as "DISPERSION", t.parent as "PARENT", t.tree_level as "TREE_LEVEL", CAST(CASE WHEN chl.id IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS VARCHAR2(1)) as "IS_LEAF" FROM (SELECT * FROM TABLE(dbms_data_mining.GET_MODEL_DETAILS_KM('"ODMUSER"."CLUS_KM_1_28"'))) t, table(t.child)(+) chl) )
